title: La Perdita Ombrelo de Nirano
description: **Nirano’s Lost Umbrella** is a heartfelt children’s picture book told entirely in Esperanto, designed for ages 5–6. During Thailand’s Songkran water festival, young Nirano loses a treasured umbrella from his grandmother. As he searches with help from kind neighbors and reflects with his wise grandmother, he learns that asking for help and sharing feelings are acts of strength—not weakness. Set in a vibrant Thai village and illustrated in soft watercolor, this story is a gentle invitation to talk about emotions, family, memory, and hope.
